sonaliFeed.name: Prestige Sonali Pre-Starter Feed
sonaliFeed.description: Specially formulated feed for young Sonali chicks in the pre-starter phase.
sonaliFeed.ingredients: Corn, soybean meal, wheat, vitamins, minerals
sonaliFeed.usage: Feed from day 1 to day 7 to provide essential nutrients for healthy growth.

sonaliFeed.name: Prestige Sonali Starter Feed
sonaliFeed.description: Nutritious feed for Sonali chickens during the starter phase.
sonaliFeed.ingredients: Corn, soybean meal, wheat, vitamins, minerals
sonaliFeed.usage: Feed from day 8 to day 21 to support optimal growth and development.

sonaliFeed.name: Prestige Sonali Grower Feed
sonaliFeed.description: Balanced feed for Sonali chickens during the grower phase.
sonaliFeed.ingredients: Corn, soybean meal, wheat, vitamins, minerals
sonaliFeed.usage: Feed from day 22 to day 35 to ensure proper weight gain and muscle development.

sonaliFeed.name: Prestige Sonali Finisher Feed
sonaliFeed.description: Final phase feed for Sonali chickens during the finishing stage.
sonaliFeed.ingredients: Corn, soybean meal, wheat, vitamins, minerals
sonaliFeed.usage: Feed from day 36 until market weight to promote meat quality and overall health.
